Tests Input.dispatchKeyEvent method.
-----Event-----
type: keydown
keyCode: 65
key: A

-----Event-----
type: keypress
shiftKey
keyCode: 65
charCode: 65

-----Event-----
type: keyup
keyCode: 65
key: A

-----Event-----
type: keypress
keyCode: 1513
charCode: 1513

-----Event-----
type: keydown
shiftKey
keyCode: 16
location: 1
code: ShiftLeft

-----Event-----
type: keydown
shiftKey
keyCode: 16
location: 2
code: ShiftRight
